ygData.subject: Reminder: Heritrix Usage survey
ygData.msgSnippet: If you haven t already, please help us out by filling out the survey linked below. That will greatly help us with our planning for 2008. Thanks everyone! -Paul

X-Yahoo-Profile: poetbeware

If you haven't already, please help us out by filling out the survey  
linked below. That will greatly help us with our planning for 2008.

Thanks everyone!

-Paul

Begin forwarded message:

> From: Kris Carpenter <kcarpenter@...>
> Date: November 21, 2007 7:00:21 PM PST
> To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Heritrix Usage Survey
> Reply-To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
>
> pswd: heritrix
>
> Kris Carpenter wrote:
> >
> >
> > The Internet Archive recently created a Heritrix Usage survey at:
> >
> > http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=wduuZtRuecv7PGkL6Cjo8Q_3d_3d
> > <http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=wduuZtRuecv7PGkL6Cjo8Q_3d_3d>
> >
> > The goal of this survey is to document the breadth and depth of  
> Heritrix
> > use cases to facilitate:
> >
> > 1) Communication and collaboration within the user community
> > 2) Testing and verification of new software builds
> > 3) Prioritization of features and bug fixes
> > 4) Ongoing support of prior versions and migration paths to new  
> builds
> > 5) More robust documentation of primary use cases and workflows.
> >
> > This survey is designed to be filled out in its entirety per  
> Heritrix
> > use case. If the person or persons responsible for crawling at your
> > institution do not have the time to fill this out more than once,  
> please
> > have them provide details only for your primary use case.
> >
> > The results of this survey will be made anonymous prior to  
> distribution
> > to the community to encourage participation.
> >
> > Thanks in advance for your help in this effort!
> >
> > The Heritrix Engineering Team
> >
> >
>
>
